snippet.title: Pantheon: Rise of The Fallen  - Early Access Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Pantheon: Rise of The Fallen is officially releasing in Early Access this December 2024 - check out our preview of all our upcoming content for the start of Early Access, information on pricing, and even a couple surprises.

Wishlist us on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3107230/Pantheon_Rise_of_the_Fallen/

Learn more about Pantheon at https://www.PantheonMMO.com 

Visionary Realms is an indie studio, and Pantheon is funded through pledges and investments. For information about available pledging opportunities visit https://www.PantheonMMO.com/Pledge

More about Early Access: https://www.pantheonmmo.com/early-access/

Check out our production tracker: https://www.pantheonmmo.com/pantheon-production-updates/

Learn more about Pantheon at https://www.PantheonMMO.com | Check out our new Season at https://www.PantheonMMO.com/seasons

Follow our social media and latest news!
https://linktr.ee/pantheonmmo

Visionary Realms is an indie studio, and Pantheon is funded through pledges and investments. For information about available pledging opportunities visit https://www.PantheonMMO.com/Pledge

#PantheonMMO #EarlyAccess
